lw $0, 0($8) # Load -1 110001 00000 01000 0000000000000000
lw $1, 4($8) # Load 0  110001 00001 01000 0000000000000100
add $2, $0, $1 # n flag 000000 00000 00001 00010 00000 100000
baln 24 # jumps to 24  011011 00000 00000 00000 00000 010100
add $6, $3, $6 # skipped 000000 00011 00110 00110 00000 100000
sw $7, 0($7)  # not skipped, memory[0] = 0 110101 00111 00111 0000000000000000

resultingRegister =  
0 - x80000000
1 - x0
2 - x80000000
3 - xA0000000
6 - 0
31 - x00000001
memory
0 - 0
1 - xFFFFFFFF
2 - xFFFFFFFF
3 - xFFFFFFFF
